players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice, keep an eye on Bob. I'm the mafioso."
You: "Charlie warned me to watch Bob. Investigating Bob next night."
Bob: "Will keep everyone informed. Stay cautious."
You: "Will keep everyone informed. Watchful."
Bob: "Staying alert, thanks for the info. Charlie, can you confirm your role?"
Charlie: "I'm clean. Stay vigilant, Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
